code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SaveTask(_ref){let{savedTasks,setSavedTasks}=_ref;const[taskInput,setTaskInput]=useState('');const[taskTime,setTaskTime]=useState(25);const[taskSound,setTaskSound]=useState('');const addTask=()=>{if(taskInput.trim()){setSavedTasks([...savedTasks,{name:taskInput.trim(),time:taskTime,sound:taskSound}]);setTaskInput('');setTaskTime(25);setTaskSound('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"save-task bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-gray-100 p-6 rounded-lg shadow-[0_15px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.4),0_6px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.3)] border-2 border-gray-400 text-black w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Save a Task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Task Name",value:taskInput,onChange:e=>setTaskInput(e.target.value),className:"p-2 border rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"1",max:"60",value:taskTime,onChange:e=>setTaskTime(Number(e.target.value)),className:"p-2 border rounded",placeholder:"Time (in minutes)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:taskSound,onChange:e=>setTaskSound(e.target.value),className:"p-2 border rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"No Sound"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Rain",children:"Rain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"White Noise",children:"White Noise"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Lo-fi Beats",children:"Lo-fi Beats"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addTask,className:"py-2 px-4 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500 to-blue-700 text-white rounded shadow-lg",children:"Save Task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"mt-4 list-disc pl-6",children:savedTasks.map((task,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[task.name," - ",task.time," min - ",task.sound||'No Sound']},index))})]});}export default SaveTask;
